body.name: Steamer for clothes Travel Steamer Portable Steamer Mini Size with 1200W&10s Fast Heat up For Any Fabrics. No Water Spitting.For Home. Office and Travel

features: [High-Quality Ironing Performance]: Experience exceptional ironing with our 1200W high-power iron featuring a large 5278mm² stainless-steel panel and a high steam output of 21g/min. The intensive steam at a consistent high temperature of 266 ℉, coupled with the ample panel surface, effortlessly smooths wrinkles on clothes of all materials, leaving no traces after ironing.

[High Quality]: this steamer for clothing boasts a leak-free design, a large 5.41-ounce visible water tank, rapid 10-second heating, and a generous 15-minute usage time. It also includes an extra-long 1.8m cable. Equipped with a high-precision water pump, it ensures zero water leakage and stability during use.

[Portable, Foldable, Dual Ironing Approach]: Our unique design combines traditional ironing performance with foldable and portable features with small folded size at 8.6*4.5*3.38 in. Ideal for business trips, travel, and office use, it supports both flat ironing and hanging ironing approaches.

[Safety and All-Season Clothing]: Safe for use on all types of clothing, from coats to t-shirts, regardless of thickness. Suitable for autumn and winter seasons, and even curtains. It includes a 40-second automatic shut-off feature to prevent overheating in case of water depletion or accidental power left on.

[About Clovyne]: We are customer-centric and specialize in professional garment steamers for your daily and business needs. We prioritize user experience and are committed to delivering top-quality products with outstanding design. Our support team is ready to assist with any inquiries or concerns.

High Steam Output at 21g/min – Effectively revitalizes and relaxes clothes, preparing them for smooth ironing. Maintains a Consistent Temperature of 266 ℉ – Ensuring an ideal balance between ironing quality and fabric protection.

One-Press-Start Button Activate or deactivate the steamer in One-Single-Press Of The Button. No need to consistent press the button when using. LED Light Reminder LED light reminder from red to green indicates whether the steamer has finished the pre-heating and ready to use No-Water Shutoff System Precautious 40 seconds automatic shut-off system when running out of water. Prevent from potential risks and harm from improper manual handling. 5.9 feet Cable Equipped with extra-long cable of 5.9 feet for customers to use under various circumstances. reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Purchase is worthy
reviews.reviewText: I recently had the opportunity to try this portable clothes steamer, and I must say, it looks and works great! From the moment I unboxed it, I was impressed by the design and quality of this device. The design is not only aesthetically well but also incredibly functional, fitting perfectly in my hand and easy to use with just one button. The water tank is awesome as well, allowing me to steam multiple garments with just a simple fill. I am really happy that I bought it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars New Travel Essential!
reviews.reviewText: I’ve been looking for a portable steamer forever since I travel a lot and want to look good. This is by far the best one! (Already tossed the other ones lol) Very easy to use, light weight, doesn’t take much space! Gets the job done perfectly! Very happy with my purchase! Will recommend to anyone who needs it :)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This works perfectly as described- we love it! Very simple and efficient.
reviews.reviewText: We love the product! We've tried others (and they leaked or were very cumbersome). This is very streamlined and easy to use. It would've been a bonus if it came with a bag for travel and storing. Also, I use a small hot mat to set it on, so it doesn't burn our countertop. I would definitely recommend it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very cute and functional product
reviews.reviewText: I gave my shot because I was really attracted by its appearance and description. And so great that it even exceeded my expectation. The steam is so intensive and strong. The ironing panel surface is large and flat. So the iron result is so good that I have to leave my recommandation here. It has a large water tank and it's built-out so you can easily see how much water is left! And again, it looks so great overall and in detail too! It's nice designed!after 3 months of consistent using, it’s still working great. I attached some pictures to see the effect after ironing. Wrinkles are all gone and the quality still perfect after months

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Practical and easy to use.
reviews.reviewText: I wasn't looing for a travel size steamer but just a small one for the house. This worked out fairly well. Comfortable to use and does a good job of smoothing out wrinkles in my dress shirts. Small and easy to store when not in use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Great portable unit
reviews.reviewText: *update*Unit is bricked after only two months. Sad.Great little unit. Powers up quickly. The face gets hot as well which helps get rid of wrinkles. Used side by side with an expensive conair unit at a hotel and preferred this unit. Great buy!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazing product!! Highly recommend
reviews.reviewText: I just got it today, and it looks so neat and clean. I tried it on my shirt, and it works perfectly fine. Five stars for sure!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to use product
reviews.reviewText: Just got the product and tried it. It heats very quickly and is very easy to use. The size is suitable to be carried for traveling. Great product!
